languages.text: "Под сенью свирепых лучей мертвящей звезды наш народ совершал истлевание в хрупкости тел заключения, являл обреченность, стремглавясь к скорому и славы лишенному несуществованию. Война пожирала бытие снаружи и изнутри, а единство являло призрак недостижимости мечтаний. Так сбывалось, покуда не был изведан зов жнецов мертвенных звезд".

traits.locale_text: "Под сенью свирепых лучей мертвящей звезды наш народ совершал истлевание в хрупкости тел заключения, являл обреченность, стремглавясь к скорой и славы лишенной гибели воплощение. Война пожирала бытие нами снаружи и изнутри, а единство эхом являло призрак недостижимости мечт. Так сбывалось покуда мы не изведали зов жнецов мертвенных звезд".

languages.text: "Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, prisoners of our own brittle bodies, our race was withering, doomed to hurtle toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."
languages.original_text: "Под сенью свирепых лучей мертвящей звезды наш народ совершал истлевание в хрупкости тел заключения, являл обреченность, стремглавясь к скорому и славы лишенному несуществованию. Война пожирала бытие снаружи и изнутри, а единство являло призрак недостижимости мечтаний. Так сбывалось, покуда не был изведан зов жнецов мертвенных звезд".

traits.locale_text: "Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, our race was withering and crumbling: prisoners of our own brittle bodies hurtling toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a phantom of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

"Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, our race was withering and crumbling: prisoners of our own brittle bodies hurtling toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a phantom of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

"Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, prisoners of our own brittle bodies, our race was withering, doomed to hurtle toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

languages.text: «Bañado en los rayos de una estrella letal y atrapado en nuestros frágiles cuerpos, nuestro pueblo se marchitaba. Estaba condenado a una aniquilación rauda y banal. La guerra devoraba nuestra existencia por dentro y por fuera y la unidad era un espectro, un sueño inalcanzable. Así eran las cosas, era lo único que conocíamos hasta que escuchamos la llamada de los segadores de estrellas».
languages.original_text: "Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, prisoners of our own brittle bodies, our race was withering, doomed to hurtle toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

traits.locale_text: «Bañado en los rayos de una estrella letal y atrapado en nuestros frágiles cuerpos, nuestro pueblo se marchitaba. Estaba condenado a una aniquilación rauda y banal. La guerra devoraba nuestra existencia por dentro y por fuera y la unidad era un espectro, un sueño inalcanzable. Así eran las cosas, era lo único que conocíamos hasta que escuchamos la llamada de los segadores de estrellas».

languages.text: « Baignant dans les terribles rayonnements d'une étoile mortelle, prisonniers de nos corps précaires, notre race était sur le déclin, condamnée à connaître une fin imminente et sans gloire. La guerre dévorait l'existence de l'intérieur comme de l'extérieur et l'unité ne semblait qu'un rêve hors d'atteinte. Il en était ainsi et nous ne connaissions rien d'autre, jusqu'à ce que nous entendissions l'appel des faucheurs d'étoiles mortelles. »
languages.original_text: "Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, prisoners of our own brittle bodies, our race was withering, doomed to hurtle toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

traits.locale_text: « Baignant dans les terribles rayonnements d'une étoile mortelle, prisonniers de nos corps précaires, notre race était sur le déclin, condamnée à connaître une fin imminente et sans gloire. La guerre dévorait l'existence de l'intérieur comme de l'extérieur et l'unité ne semblait qu'un rêve hors d'atteinte. Il en était ainsi et nous ne connaissions rien d'autre, jusqu'à ce que nous entendissions l'appel des faucheurs d'étoiles mortelles. »

languages.text: 「獰猛なる死せる星の光線を浴び、脆き体の囚人である我が種族は衰弱し、急速に恥ずべき消滅に向かう運命にありました。戦争は内外の存在を貪り、結束は届かぬ夢の幻影。それが、我々が死せる星の死神の呼び声を聞くまでの、世界のあり方でした」
languages.original_text: "Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, prisoners of our own brittle bodies, our race was withering, doomed to hurtle toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

traits.locale_text: 「獰猛なる死せる星の光線を浴び、脆き体の囚人である我が種族は衰弱し、急速に恥ずべき消滅に向かう運命にありました。戦争は内外の存在を貪り、結束は届かぬ夢の幻影。それが、我々が死せる星の死神の呼び声を聞くまでの、世界のあり方でした」

languages.text: “我们的种族沐浴在致命恒星炽热的凶光之下。我们囚禁在脆弱的身体之中，正在不断枯萎，注定将面临迫在眉睫的殒灭。战火吞噬了内部与外部的一切，统一的梦想仿佛无形的幽灵一样，恐怕永远无法实现。这就是一切的定数，我们注定在一无所知中徘徊，直到致命凶星的收割者前来呼唤我们为止。”
languages.original_text: "Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, prisoners of our own brittle bodies, our race was withering, doomed to hurtle toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

traits.locale_text: “我们的种族沐浴在致命恒星炽热的凶光之下。我们囚禁在脆弱的身体之中，正在不断枯萎，注定将面临迫在眉睫的的殒灭。战火吞噬了内部与外部的一切，统一的梦想仿佛无形的幽灵一样，恐怕永远无法实现。这就是一切的定数，我们注定在一无所知中徘徊，直到致命凶星的收割者前来呼唤我们为止。”

languages.text: "Gebadet in die unerbittlichen Strahlen eines tödlichen Sterns, Gefangene unserer eigenen brüchigen Körper, verkümmerte unsere Spezies, dazu verdammt, auf die baldige, ruhmlose Auslöschung zuzurasen. Der Krieg verschlang die Existenz im Inneren und Äußeren, und Einheit war ein Geist unerreichbarer Träume. So waren die Dinge, und wir kannten nichts anderes, bis wir den Ruf der Schnitter tödlicher Sterne hörten."
languages.original_text: "Bathed in the ferocious rays of a deadly star, prisoners of our own brittle bodies, our race was withering, doomed to hurtle toward imminent and inglorious obliteration. War devoured existence within and without, and unity was a spectre of dreams unattainable. Such was the way of things, and we knew nought else till we heard the call of the reapers of deathly stars."

traits.locale_text: "Gebadet in die unerbittlichen Strahlen eines tödlichen Sterns, Gefangene unserer eigenen brüchigen Körper, verkümmerte unsere Spezies, dazu verdammt, auf die baldige, ruhmlose Auslöschung zuzurasen. Der Krieg verschlang die Existenz im Inneren und Äußeren, und Einheit war ein Geist unerreichbarer Träume. So waren die Dinge, und wir kannten nichts anderes, bis wir den Ruf der Schnitter tödlicher Sterne hörten."
